terms.name: contact affiliation
terms.value: Ludwig Institute for Cancer Research, Department of Cellular and Molecular Medicine, Univ. of California at San Diego

description: Mass spectrometry was used to determine the components which associate with CENP-ATAP during replication in late S phase, following affinity purification of CENP-A nucleosomes. CENP-ATAP was immunoprecipitated from the chromatin fraction of randomly cycling cells or late S synchronized cells. Mass spectrometry was performed on Velos Orbitrap.

modifications.name: No PTMs are included in the dataset

terms.name: Dataset with no associated published manuscript

title: Centromere maintenance during DNA replication by retention of centromeric CENP-A coupled to removal of non-centromeric CENP-A
